system.requirements:
Tier 1; Toughness 40
Aptitudes: Toughness, Defence, Nurgle
system.effect: If the Character is Stunned, they can make a +0 Toughness Test as a Free Action to ignore the effects.

description.value: If the Character is Stunned, they can make a +0 Toughness Test as a Free Action to ignore the effects.
